p: The plates were incubated at 37°C for 24–48 hours. After that, the diameters of growth inhibition zones were measured by the electronic vernier caliper (Insize 1112–200). The following control agents were used: positive control agents, ampicillin 20 μg/ml (for bacteria) and ketoconazole 20 μg/ml (for yeasts); negative control agent, 10% DMSO.
